Row.Text: Military units trained in this city start with additional free promotion. Accumulate +1 of the most advanced revealed strategic resource.
Enemy Spies operate at 2 levels below normal in this city and 1 level below normal in other cities.

Replace.Text: Units within the city's territory get +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. Your other cities within 9 tiles gain +4 Loyalty per turn towards your civilization.
City cannot be put under siege. +50% [ICON_Production] Production towards walls. City gains an additional [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Strike per turn.
+6 power and +1 [ICON_Ranged] range to city strike. +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities for each level of walls. Enemy units pillaging city districts and tiles lose 2 [ICON_Movement] Movement points.
